Instantly.AddIRCMessage: She's gone..? Forever? I can't believe you made it.
Thanks, you had a connection with her in the netmap and that was enough for me to track the neural node.
This is... Uh... I don't know what to say... This feels like a aching deja vu.
I guess we dealt with a big issue... Lillycord...
I leaked information from the database to the authorities, and they'll make sure Aegis is closed forever, and all thanks to you.
You did a great favor for us today #PLAYERNAME#, you saved us all from Artificial Intelligence Doomsday.
I... I don't know what to say now, it's all done, Aegis is closed forever, Peace is in prison with a death sentence and the last family I had is dead.
But she had to die some time, she was the one behind all this... And we did her a favor by killing her, she deserved to be resting in peace now, she deserved to get out of that cage.
I still feel bad because she was my mother's ex partner and I knew she wanted to protect us but... She choose the wrong path to do so.
